data.text: Magi e yawuot Daudi mane onywolo ka en Hebron:
mar adek ne en Abisalom wuod Maaka nyar Talmai ruodh Geshur,
mar abich ne en Shefatia wuod Abital;
Yawuowi auchielgi ne onywol ni Daudi ka en Hebron, kuma ne obedoe ruoth kuom higni abiriyo gi dweche auchiel.
kendo magi e nyithindo mane onywolne Jerusalem kuno:
Bende ne nitiere Ibhar, Elishua, Elifelet,
Noga, Nefeg, Jafia,
Elishama, Eliada, kod Elifelet; giduto ne gin ji ochiko.
Magi duto ne gin yawuot Daudi, ka waweyo yawuote mane onywolo gi mondene mamoko. To Tamar ne nyamin-gi.
Solomon nonywolo Rehoboam,
Jehoshafat nonywolo Jehoram,
Joash nonywolo Amazia,
Jotham nonywolo Ahaz,
Manase nonywolo Amon,
Yawuot Josia ne gin:
Joma nokawo loch bang º Jehoyakim ne gin yawuote miluongo ni:
Nyikwa Jehoyakin mane onywol ka en e twech ne gin:
Malkiram Pedaya, Shenazar, Jekamia, Hoshama kod Nedabia.
Yawuot Pedaya ne gin:
Yawuowi abich mamoko mane Zerubabel onywolo ne gin: Hashuba, Ohel, Berekia, Hasadia kod Jushab-Hesed.
Nyikwa Hanania ne gin:
Shekania nonywolo Shemaya:
Yawuot Nearia ne gin:
Yawuot Elioenai ne gin:
